title: Chat Question
description: Schema for q{NN}.chat.{lang}.json — multi-turn chat question files.

text.description: The initial prompt or question text displayed to the student.

max_turns.description: Maximum number of conversation turns allowed.

min_words_per_turn.description: Minimum number of words required in each student turn.

correct_answer.description: Reference answer used by the AI evaluator for scoring the conversation.

explanation.description: Explanation shown to the student after submission (when show_explanations is true).

image_url.description: Optional image URL displayed alongside the question.

ai_context.description: Additional context sent to the AI evaluator for this question.

ai_suggestions.description: Pre-authored AI suggestions with associated scores.

text.description: Suggestion text shown to the student.
